GeneDef.label: hemoinitiate
GeneDef.description: For hemoinitiates, the blood in their veins doesn't just give them life, it's a moral guide. Hemoinitiates specialize in enhancing the abilities of others.

GeneDef.label: praise
GeneDef.description: This hemoinitiate regenerates hemomgen faster than normal hemomancers. If Ideology is enabled, ideology spread frequency is increased based on Hemomancy Proficiency.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases ideology spread frequency based on Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: convert blood
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can convert some of their blood into hemogen.

GeneDef.label: bloodlust
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can drive a pawn into a murderous rage for two hours. While in the murderous rage, the pawn will be immune to pain, and have increased melee damage and accuracy. The range of this ability is influenced by Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: hemoclotting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can seal a pawn's wounds, and stops them from bleeding from any other wounds they may receive over the next day.\n\nThe range of this ability is influenced by Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: hemopriest
GeneDef.description: Hemopriests release a constant "holy" aura that makes everyone around them willing to listen to them about the gifts blood can bring. Many of them also have the ability to release a rejuvenating mist and create small pills that greatly enhance combative abilities.

GeneDef.label: worship
GeneDef.description: This hemopriest regenerates hemomgen faster than normal hemomancers. If Ideology is enabled, ideology spread frequency is increased based on Hemomancy Proficiency. If the carrier also has praise, the regen is additive, and the ideology spread frequency is multiplicative.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases ideology spread frequency based on Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: the gift of blood
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene constantly condense large amounts of hemogen into pills that prevent a pawn from getting infected wounds, and enhances their ability to heal wounds and gain immunity on existing infections. If the consumer's ideology makes them hate bloodfeeders, this pill will also suppress that feeling for the duration. This will create 1 pill every day, and each pill has a duration of 10 days.

This pill will NOT give hemogen to hemogenic pawns.

This is not impacted by Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: blood cloud
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can drive a pawn into a murderous rage for two hours. While in the murderous rage, the pawn will be immune to pain, and have increased melee damage and accuracy. The range of this ability is influenced by Hemomancy Proficiency.

GeneDef.label: replenish blood
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can release a burst of hemogen that seals wounds and removes any blood loss allies around them may have suffered.\n\nThis is not impacted by Hemomancy Proficiency.
